reviews.text: Delicious food, a bit on the expensive side. Service could be a bit kinder. Overall decent experience.
The waitresses are attentive and the atmosphere is pleasant. The food is nothing spectacular and a bit overpriced but I would still go again because of the staff and atmosphere.
Keep coming Back
Always hot fresh great service
Always so much food for the price.
What a great place
Excelente chicharr√≥n de cerdo

Not the worst ‚Äútres golpes‚Äù but def not the best or nowhere near it. The mangu was off texture and bland. I also ordered an oatmeal juice which was totally off. There‚Äôs a way better restaurant that‚Äôs in the same area hi h is war better quality, it‚Äôs called El Tinas, better bang for your buck and way better taste
Good food, and good service.

I am an employee at the Cubesmart at 5740 Broadway and I have to say; there‚Äôs two women who take the best care of me the moment they see me walk into the restaurant and for that I am highly appreciative and grateful to be served by those two, forgive as I do not know their names but I plan to visit and learn their names personally. My name is JUANITA and the food here is magical.
Great!!!  food ü•ò and drinks üçπ
My Brother and I went yesterday he ordered a shrimp soup HORRIBLE and very SALTY ON TOP OF that very expensive ...... he order wasn't what we expected to get ......don't go there
El guatemalteco que atiende un chaparrito, atiende s√∫per mal hasta grita a los clientes!!!
Muy mala experiencia sancocho en un plato normal Wao primer restaurante que veo eso no vuelvo m√°s pi√©nsenlo antes de ir muy mal costumer service ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è‚Ä¶

La atenci√≥n al cliente es horrible, la se√±ora peque√±a Dominicana es una persona grosera, no nos escuchaba y contestaba con actitud, y sarcasticamente, ademas de que se pidio un sancocho y no hecho ni una sola carne, pedimos algo mas  y nos dios lo que ella quiso, ademas de que nisiquiera espero a que terminaramos de pedir y saco cuenta dos veces, porque ella estaba muy desesperada en salir de nosotros, no volver√© jamas a ese negocio ojala q nadie mas pase por est,  era mi primera vez comprando en este restaurante y fue muy desagradable.

La musica es insoportable y alta.
Uno no puede en su hora de almuerzo comunicarse con nadie porque no mo te oyen.
Me he quejado varias veces pero no hacen caso.
Excelente
Great spanish food üëå really amazing won't be disappointed.
First & foremost we got the Cafe con leche. Then we ordered our usual Mangu with huevos Frito, longaniza, & queso Frito. üòã
The best roasted chicken flavor I've had. The favor is by far the best. The meat is juicy and not dry at all
Excellent local food near the ocean with beautiful views
Muy acogedor,Buenos precios.Comida exquisita

Ame este lugar. Su personal muy amable  y se adaptan a lo que uno  necesita, ped√≠ algo que necesitaba tiempo  para prepararse y me resolvieron r√°pido y con muy buena atenciones. Los recomiendo, su comida fue 100 de 100
Worst Pernil I ever had in my life. It was so dry and a little amount for a $15 lunch order
Compre un sancocho grande  y me lo sirvieron en un plato  menos de un sancocho peque√±o  y  parec√≠a una sopa de sobre de tan aguado y 2 carne peque√±a  no lo recomiendo
Pricey

Tasty as per usual. We got the combo platter with the grilled pepper steak and chicken, which was enough to feed two. Service and attentiveness was wonderful. Would come again for a quick bite!

ALWAYS get the fried sweet plantains. They‚Äôre delicious every time.
Whenever I‚Äôm in town I have to get my fix, the CHICKEN AND THE GREEEN SAUCE IS LIFEE

El peor restaurante que yo e podido ordenar comida. Ped√≠ un mofongo de chicharron y la base con queso y chicharr√≥n. Solo me lleg√≥ la Base osea la bola de pl√°tano y ensalada. Y el Chicharr√≥n???? Entonces ustedes cobran $27 por una bola de‚Ä¶
Primera ves k me sale tan mala la comida el sancocho esta malo el chicharon de pollo tanbien estaba malo la abichuela esta mala solo el rabo estaba bueno y el aroz.
If it is always full and you see people waiting, that should tell you something.

Hemos venido varias veces a este lugar, pero esta √∫ltima vez vine a comer por mi cumplea√±os y resulta que hemos pedido una ‚ÄúPaella‚Äù como Vera en la foto parece estar llena de mariscos, pero cuando comimos la parte de arriba que √≠bamos a buscar dentro del arroz solo era arroz amarillo sin ning√∫n marisco ni nada en absoluto.

Las paellas son un poco de arroz abajo y arriba full de mariscos. En las fotos se ver√° que las primeras fotos luce espectacular‚Ä¶ solo 3 langostinos, media cola de langosta peque√±a, y disfrazado de calamar y cangrejo sin nada de masa. Con unas muelas flaquitas. Si miras el plato full de arroz amarillo. Sin nada de mariscos adentro, pero el plato que tienen en el men√∫ es muy diferente.

Llamamos al Manager para hacerle la sugerencia de mejorar el servicio y jam√°s quiso ir a la mesa a mirar ni a escucharnos, nos pidi√≥ que fu√©ramos a la caja y cuando llegamos lo que dijo es que est√°bamos reclamando para no pagar‚Ä¶ nos insult√≥ sin justificaci√≥n porque dijo que el vio que el servicio estaba bien sin ni siquiera alejarse de la caja. Nos trat√≥ con mucha groser√≠a y los dem√°s empleados que estaban del lado del mostrador lo que hac√≠an era burlarse y apoyar lo que dec√≠a el manager como si nuestra intenci√≥n era no pagar el servicio. Nos trajeron una cuenta de 63 d√≥lares en lo que era un servicio de 50, que ten√≠amos mas que sobrado dinero para pagar‚Ä¶

En definitiva, si es tu cumplea√±os o quieres llevar tu familia a comer, este no es el lugar ideal. Vas a pasar un muy mal gusto si tienes que reclamar el servicio.

I ordered fried pork, rice and beans. The pork was tasteless, dried and hard. The waitress gave me several sauces to help it, however,  nothing worked. I could not eat it and they still charged me. Needless to say, the food was pretty bad and still have to pay for it. I barely touched it.
Food always good
Regular
I told the lady I wanted lunch special and she bring me back a big plate and then on top of that the food had no flavor the one in manhattan is 100 times better

Food was great. Although the buffalo chicken wing were tiny, but good! Had Sancocho and should have been served in a plate bowl, but was very good. Coronas were ice cold, yes!!
Gladly gave 18% tip. Can‚Äôt wait to go back and try other dishesüòã

The food is good, but I can only give it 3 stars because my experience has been hit or miss. I've ordered multiple times, and while sometimes the pernil is fantastic, other times it can be quite dry. The ‚Äúv√≠veres‚Äù also lack salt on occasion. There are moments when the meal is amazing, but there are also times when it falls short. On the bright side, the portions are always generous, and the staff is really friendly!

UBER EATS ORDER; Before ordering from here If your item isn‚Äôt available, make sure that the courier or the restaurant cancels do not do it on your end. Restaurant in courier refuse to cancel and said that I needed to and when I did, I ended up being charged $50 for something I did not receive and they did not have. Uber Eats will not, absolutely not refund you.
Excellent service
Take seemed to be better for me but dine in service was ok.  Had the chicharron de pollo and yuca. The yuca is excellent.

I ordered Pernil a whole 90 dollars for my Christmas dinner and sadly we go to open it up to serve and it‚Äôs MADUROS!!! I will be coming the day after Christmas to fix this‚Äî this is unacceptable
So lesson to everyone out there CHECK CHECK CHECK because they clearly DONT! IT SAID PERNIL ON THE BAG

I was a my mami wake and it was a Monday night. All those who stood to the end were invited to eat. Malecon was the closest restaurant. The food was good. The place decor was nice and the location was clean. When the bill arrived, i was delighted that the bill was not high. I will definitely return.

Marcelino needs to be fired! Horrible customer service. He has the nasties attitude and hangs up on customers. The man can not do a thing and has no clue what he is doing. How he is employed is beyond me. That man is useless. He tells you call for Valentino, then oh I don‚Äôt know when he is coming. You ask for a manager and he hangs the phone up. DISGUSTING. I was supposed to use this restaurant for events for my company ABSOLUTELY NOT!

The location is very convenient, but parking can be a problem. The place is pulsating with energy and aromatic smells from the kitchen. The service is quick and efficient. I catered a large party with Malecon and I was not at all disappointed. The food arrived at the expected time, hot and delicious, the chicken was moist and mouthwatering, the rice and beans was incredibly tasty and full of flavor. I will definitely use their food to host another party. Malecon is a great place to cater your party. I was very pleased.
King of the rotisserie chicken, steak w/onions and sanchoco. My go to when the area. Can't go wrong. Come hungry as portions are large.
The Best!!

The food was delicious,  the rice & stew red beans so good  even order extra to go home. 10 out 10 for the food.  The service was  fair. As we entered, that was a line no one acknowledged us again. The bathroom was  not clean. Very crowded.

Possibly one of the best Spanish restaurants I've ever been to. As soon as we walked into the door we were greeted with a friendly smile and seated instantaneously. I appreciate how fast the food came considering the countless number of take-out orders.
As for the food, it was delicious. Juicy, tender, well-seasoned chicken that hits the spot. Mondongo soup comes hot and satistfied my cravings. Everyone left the restaurants happy and with a full belly. Highly reccommend.

Wanted a Bistec "steak " but Lady said only Carne de res. Got me confused üòï,. So I ordered chicken mofongo,. Later I checked the menu and they do have steak mofongo. Shrimp didn't explain well SMH. The food was Good and tasty üòã I'll come back.

Comida muy sabrosa y servicio excelente, tanto en ingl√©s como en espa√±ol.
Very tasty food and excellent service, both in English and Spanish.

Decided to place a phone call for delivery. Order the churrasco (well done) w mashed potato, bistec encebollado w tostones and 3 patelitos. The churrasco came pink inside & mashed potatoe was bland. The tostones where hard. I ordered 3 pastelitos for my nephew one of the chicken pastelitos had a bone inside (very unsafe)  Asides from the food there customer service was horrible.when they answer the phone they immediately put you on hold and when they do manage to answer 5min later they have the audacity to have an attitude and rush you. I‚Äôm super upset it‚Äôs my birthday and this was not it!

One of the best rotisserie chicken around the city if not the best, I have been to this location multiple times and the flavor is always the same. The side orders are a wide variety and great taste. The only downside is the parking as all‚Ä¶

Tasty food, bring your appetite, the portions "son generosos"!

Whether you are in need of feasting on pernil, mangu, mofongo, chicken and rice or simply caf√© con leche. The fruit smoothies/batidos can be made with milk or water.

If you drive here, finding parking can be a challenge, you have been warned!

Great Atmosphere, clean inside everything looks good, didn't liked the rice, was dry and the salad needs a little flavor, enjoyed the chicken  and plantains, tamarind drink was excellent and forget about the tres leches,,,,is to die for, jaja
I've been going here since I was a kid and I can say, I love eating here. It's my favorite spot to get rice and beans. I love the salsa Verde too

Malecon is a staple in this community when it comes to authentic spanish cuisine. They serve you bread as an appetizer and the portions are more than enough you‚Äôre going to need a TO GO box trust me ! I recommend the Lemon Chicken w/ Mashed potatoes ! Never Disappoints ü•π

I haven‚Äôt been here since 2007 and all I can tell you is that the food is still the same as it was the last time I came here.. PHENOMENAL‚Ä¶ and the Gentleman who took my order was EXCEPTIONAL‚Ä¶the Rotisserie Chicken is on point as well as the Red Beans and White Rice.. if you happen to be on W 231st in the Bronx.. you most definitely need to stop by‚Ä¶ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©
Roast pork with yellow rice and pinto beans. Everything was delicious.  Service great and welcoming atmosphere.
Good food!! I particularly liked the fried green bananas (plantains). The mondongo reminded me of Papaitan dish back in the Philippines.‚Ä¶
Food was amazing portions big... $$ but worthy! Saut√© liver a must go...

I have been eating at this Malecon since they‚Äôve opened. Their prices have become absolutely ridiculous (even considering inflation). I ordered a large beans and rice (no meat!) and was charged $26.

He estado comiendo en este Malec√≥n desde que abrieron. Sus precios se han vuelto absolutamente rid√≠culos (incluso teniendo en cuenta la inflaci√≥n). Ped√≠ frijoles grandes y arroz (¬°sin carne!) Y se cobraron $26.
The Food was excellent!!! üòãThe staff is  amazing very friendly and professional Thank you for your service.‚Ä¶
As always it was so good. Mofongo wasn't hard it was soft almost creamy with each bite, tostones were fresh off the fryer, steam coming off each bite.
Food is fresh and delicious. Service was not great but will come back for the food.
I order small sancocho. It was delicious and so fulfilling. I think the rice is too much  though.
The chicharon and queso blanco mofongo is heavenly! As well as the mondongo is to die for!
Consistent Quality that I reccomend highly.  They always deserve a good 35% tip.
The place was clean the waitress was professional and the food was exquisite!
Amazing food. The mofongo con camarones is bomb and the place is great for family, a date or just to chill. I def recommend it.
Exelente lugar., toda la comida muy sabrosa., personal muy amable

Hace a√±os la comida era mejor, tal vez cambiaron de cocinero o quien sabe? U√±timamente est√° muy reseca especialmente el arroz y el pollo, los precios est√°n ridiculamente altos por la porci√≥n que dan ( a pesar de la inflaci√≥n ) y la se√±ora‚Ä¶

My mom catered some food for Mother‚Äôs Day and they didn‚Äôt even give her what she ordered. She only only chicken, rice, and maduros. They gave her like 6 platters and charged her 300$. A bunch of food she didn‚Äôt even order and they totally took advantage. I‚Äôm so mad she went there. For the rest of my life I will tell everyone I know to never step foot in there.
